Entry.Name: Debuggable Application
Entry.Description: The DEBUG mode is currently ACTIVE (android:debuggable='true' in AndroidManifest.xml). It's crucial to avoid enabling DEBUG mode in production environments, as it allows malicious users to debug the app and intercept detailed error information via Logcat.

Mitigation.Textual:
Please set the debuggable flag to FALSE if it is a production application.
Further informations about debugging your app.
